model.storage

Class SerializationDAOFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.storage.SerializationDAOFactory
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IDAOFactory

    public class SerializationDAOFactory
extends java.lang.Object
implements IDAOFactory
    Concrete factory for producing DAOs that use serialization for storage.

      • startTransaction

        public Result startTransaction()
        Description copied from interface: IDAOFactory
        Starts a transaction with the DB (if appropriate). If the program is not running in SQL mode, no action is taken.
        Specified by:
        startTransaction in interface IDAOFactory
        Returns:
        False if there was some DB error, else true.

      • endTransaction

        public Result endTransaction(boolean commit)
        Description copied from interface: IDAOFactory
        Ends the transaction with the DB (if appropriate). If the program is not running in SQL mode, no action is taken.
        Specified by:
        endTransaction in interface IDAOFactory
        Parameters:
        commit - Whether the transaction should be committed, or rolled back.
        Returns:
        False if there was some DB error, else true.
